    American Marine Research Company

    We are building a synthetic predator for a species that lacks a natural one, in a community that can promote eclectic and meaningful innovation.

    About Us

    Cutting-Edge Conservation

    For all that we do, healthy oceans are our highest prioity. Starting with lionfish in the Gulf of Mexico, we are dedicated to combating invasive species in scalable, efficient systems that extend conservation capabilities far beyond their limits today. Technology gives us the opportunity to revolutionize marine conservation, and we’re taking it.

    High-Precision Responsibility

    Leveraging advanced technologies, we deliver high precision with 0% bycatch and and zero marine waste. We’re here to protect our reefs, and that means that we’ll go the extra mile to recruiting the best pilots and engineers to our zero collateral damage policy. When it comes to doing the job right, we go the extra mile.

    The Community of Pensacola

    We work hard because who we are and where we’re from–not in spite of it. We promise to develop the community Pensacola that has embraced us since our arrival to recruit the best talent to underappreciated problem spaces and cities, create high-leverage jobs, all while working with our neighbors to accelerate STEM education and practicum.
